item.description:
Kick off Friday night with Providence's signature storytelling event. Live Bait follows the tradition of 'This American Life' and 'The Moth'. A topic is chosen each month and storytellers with something to say come on stage and tell their tale. Past topics have included All you can eat, Fruit, Pussy (seriously) and As good as it gets. The mood ranges from comic to tragic and everything in between.

This edition of Live Bait comes with a twist. Instead of a single theme, topics will be randomly drawn and anyone with something to say can take the stage to tell their story. The element of surprise should make for a interesting night.

Come on down, tell a story or just watch the improvisational hijinks unfold.

Since its Friday, we could also make our way someplace Downtown after the show.

LIVE BAIT : READY OR NOT
8:00pm Friday, March 9th, 2012
Tickets $6.00 – no reservations taken
AS220, 115 Empire St., Providence, RI

 

 

New meetup ideas are always welcome, so if you have any ideas, please contact me or another organizer.

See you there.
item.name: Live Bait @ AS220
